channel.title: How to change Wildy Location?
channel.description: Hello my name is Ben, My source is Chris-scape, and the wild is at Lumbridge I was hoping I could change it to Varrock wild area, if you could give me the code to that, that'd be very helpful Thanks.

item.title: How to change Wildy Location?
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

can someone give me the regular varrock wild code

      if (Type == 3) {            if (coordY >= yyyy && coordY <= yyyy && coordX <= xxxx                    && coordX >= xxxx) {                return true;            }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol

@pobdol wrote:

Is that to make Varrock city the wild or the actual wildy? And if you don’t mind I don’t really understand so could you give me the coords in order…?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change Wildy Location?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Go to the four corners of varrock:
Northwest, Northeast, Southeast, and southwest
Fill in the coordinates into the boolean that you have posted:

[quote=“pobdol, post:3, topic:326656”]public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 9761 && coordY <= 9755 && coordX <= 3175 && coordX >= 3161) { return true; } } return false;[/quote]

now safe zone you have to do the same thing, lets say go into a house… get the far corners of the house so it is completely safe: Northwest, Northeast, Southeast, and southwest

Enter those coordinates into:

public boolean nonwild

if you do not have nonwild you will have to set the boolean and add something like:

if(nonwild) { wildy = false; }

Those are examples that i can think of off the top of my head.
Goodluck,
LKCTheReturn

Read full topic

item.title: How to change Wildy Location?
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

No I mean the code, like lumbridge pk is:

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 9761 && coordY <= 9755 && coordX <= 3175 && coordX >= 3161) { return true; } } return false;

And I want the varrock one
